issue.title: [R] Bindings for stringr::str_starts, stringr::str_ends, base::startsWith and base::endsWith
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13924](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13924). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13924?focusedCommentId=17411211) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Would this also include base::startsWith and endsWith?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13924?focusedCommentId=17411214) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Ah yes, I'll add them to the summary!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13924?focusedCommentId=17426270) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11365
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11365>
